727449f-a.title: Queens: Myrtle Avenue - 81st Road
727449f-a.text:
Myrtle Ave., north side, between 81st Road and 82nd Ave., showing
the Glendale Schnetzen Park Hotel,about one block west of 88th Place.
It was established in 1892 by Charles Deckelman. The park was improved
at a cost of ~80,00O and then operated by him for two vears. He leased
it tben to Barney Koenig. John H. Gerken purchased the park in 1909.
In 1923 Welr and 2erweck were the owners. The 1908 Atlas of GQueens
County also shows that in 1908 it was known as the Greater New York Park
and that the owner was C.J. Hettsheimer. These buildings were demolished
prior to 1929.
May 1923.
Eumene L. Armbruster Collection.
